name: Pot of Gold
description:
Submission to Trijam #113

Theme: Rainbow

Goal: Collect 3 pots of gold in each level. (I could only complete 2 levels...).

Controls: Mouse-Only

* Art done by myself during the jam in Adobe Illustrator

* Background Music: Casual Background Music Pack by Muz Station Productions

* Rain SFX by InspectorJ https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/401275/
